products.title: Advanced Knee Brace Support
products.description: Professional-grade knee brace for maximum support and stability. Perfect for sports recovery, injury prevention, and daily therapeutic use. Adjustable straps ensure a perfect fit for all sizes.

products.title: Stabilizing Ankle Support
products.description: Comprehensive ankle support with advanced compression technology. Helps prevent injuries while providing therapeutic compression for existing conditions. Breathable material ensures comfort during extended wear.

products.title: Ergonomic Back Support Belt
products.description: Premium back support belt designed to provide lumbar support and relieve back pain. Adjustable compression straps help maintain proper posture during physical activities. Ideal for work, exercise, or everyday support.

collections.title: Orthopedic Supports
collections.description: Professional-grade orthopedic supports for pain relief, injury recovery, and everyday comfort. Our ergonomic designs provide superior support while allowing natural movement.

collections.title: Rehabilitation Products
collections.description: Complete range of rehabilitation products designed to speed recovery and strengthen muscles after injury or surgery. Doctor-recommended solutions for home therapy.

collections.title: Sports Recovery
collections.description: Advanced support products for athletes and active individuals. Designed to prevent injuries during physical activity and support recovery after intense workouts.
